The claim is supported by Governor Scott: s statement in a November 2011 appearance where he mentioned that the recall organizers had started their website in November of the previous year.
The claim is further corroborated by the: com domain name, which shows that it was registered in November 2010. This information was provided by the manager of the website, Ben Paulson.
The state Republican Party: which is assisting Governor Walker's campaign, acknowledges that liberal activists, including Ben Paulson, played a role in initiating the recall effort in the fall of 2010.
The state Democratic Party: along with the group United Wisconsin and labor organizations, is actively involved in the recall drive, which suggests that the effort was indeed underway prior to Governor Walker taking office in January 2011.
